meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes of the August 28, 2024 City Council Meeting
Authorize construction service contract for Dallas Airport System Signage Project
agenda_items.description: Authorize a construction service contract for construction services to the Dallas Airport System Signage Project at Dallas Executive Airport.

agenda_items.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to engineering services contract
agenda_items.description: Provide construction administration services to Garages A and B pedestrian concourse HVAC and roof assessment.

agenda_items.title: Authorize Advance Funding Agreement with Texas Department of Transportation
agenda_items.description: For the City of Dallasâ€™ portion of the construction of a deck cap over Interstate Highway 30 on Lamar Street.

agenda_items.title: An ordinance amending sections of the Dallas City Code, Chapter 7, 'Animals'
agenda_items.description: Amending ownership requirements for a dangerous or aggressive dog.

agenda_items.title: An ordinance abandoning a portion of a utility easement
agenda_items.description: Abandoning a portion of a utility easement to CP Hollow, LP.

agenda_items.title: An ordinance abandoning all of two water easements
agenda_items.description: Abandoning all of two water easements and a portion of a drainage easement to Victory Block M LP.

agenda_items.title: An ordinance abandoning a water easement
agenda_items.description: Abandoning a water easement to St. Mark's School of Texas.

agenda_items.title: Authorize an amendment to an existing lease agreement
agenda_items.description: Extend the lease agreement for an additional 25 years for approximately 20,000 square feet of land.

agenda_items.title: Authorize a resolution to delegate authority to issue Qualified Mortgage Revenue Bonds
agenda_items.description: Delegate to the Texas Department of Housing & Community Affairs its authority to issue bonds for financing home mortgage loans.
